description:
Rishido’s Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Jonouchi’s monsters… and his life points!  Can Jonouchi effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he already too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 受け継ぎし魂[カード] サイコショッカー反撃!
